arts.ttl: New Bochum coach Hecking hailed after 1-1 draw with Leverkusen
arts.sum: Gerrit Holtmann was full of praise for Dieter Hecking after the new Bochum coach led his team to a 1-1 draw with champions Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen denied win by late Bochum strike
arts.sum: Koji Miyoshi scored an 89th minute goal to give strugglers VfL Bochum a 1-1 draw against visiting champions Bayer Leverkusen in the Bundesliga on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Agent confirms Jonathan Tah set for big club move
arts.sum: Jonathan Tah’s agent, Pini Zahavi, has confirmed that the defender is poised for a move to a major club in the upcoming summer transfer window. This announcement has sparked interest from several top teams, including Inter and Juventus, who have been linked with the player in recent weeks. Zahavi, speaking to Welt Am Sonntag, made a clear statement about Tah’s future: “The situation is very simple. He will join a big club next summer. And Bayern Munich still has an excellent chance of signing him.” The mention of Bayern Munich is not surprising, as Zahavi revealed a previously undisclosed attempt The post Agent confirms Jonathan Tah set for big club move appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso's six-word message on Anfield return speaks volumes after Liverpool job snub
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso made his high-profile return to Anfield on Tuesday evening as his Bayer Leverkusen side faced Liverpool in the Champions League and were thrashed 4-0

arts.ttl: Koji Miyoshi strike helps Bochum snatch dramatic draw against Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Bochum secured a dramatic 1-1 draw against defending Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen in Dieter Hecking's first match in charge as coach. Patrik Schick scored the opener for the visitors but Koji Miyoshi's first Bundesliga goal at the death salvaged a point for the hosts.

arts.ttl: Koji Miyoshi strike helps Bochum snatch dramatic draw against Leverkusen
arts.sum: Bochum secured a dramatic 1-1 draw against defending Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen in Dieter Hecking's first match in charge as coach. Patrik Schick scored the opener for the visitors but Koji Miyoshi's first Bundesliga goal at the death salvaged a point for the hosts.

arts.ttl: Can sent off as Dortmund loses again and Leverkusen drops more points in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund captain Emre Can was sent off as his team slumped to its sixth straight away defeat by 3-1 at Mainz in the Bundesliga on Saturday. Lee remained the central figure, conceding a penalty for a foul on Serhou Guirassy three minutes later.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen predicted XI vs Bochum: Xabi Alonso to rotate after Liverpool defeat
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso is expected to make several changes to his Bayer Leverkusen team that suffered a 4-0 defeat against Liverpool in midweek. The Spaniard could make three or more alterations…

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich 'hatch swap deal plan' to beat Man City, Real Madrid to Florian Wirtz
arts.sum: Bayern Munich could allegedly attempt to use Bayer Leverkusen's interest in Paul Wanner in order to win the race for the in-demand Florian Wirtz.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid consider January moves for Tottenham & Bayer Leverkusen stars
arts.sum: The powers that be at La Liga giants Real Madrid are considering dipping into the market for right-back reinforcements this winter. That’s according to Marca, who have on Friday provided…
